name: You Lose
description:
Created by theNumberSeven and Dom

Click and drag/release to move, Space to brake

Collide with pucks to collect ammo

Right click to shoot a puck towards the cursor

Hit all 4 portals to win

If the goal in the center is hit by an enemy puck you lose

WASD Creates a temporary shield around the respective side of the goal

This is the first game we've ever made and learned a lot working on it. Big thanks to charlmes for hosting this jam!
